forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers developing late. Lows overnight in the upper 30s.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of late night showers. Low 3C.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving overnight. Low 37F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving overnight. Low 3C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low around 35F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 2C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. High around 45F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High 7C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 46F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 8C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. NNE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. NNE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 38F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 50F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 38F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 41F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
